body.p: To close open documents, use one of the following methods:

ul.li: Go to menu File Close () : Closes only the selected tab. All other tab instances remain opened.
Go to menu File Close All () : If you try to close a modified or a newly created document, you are first prompted to save it.
Click Close in the contextual menu of an open tab to close it.
Click Close Other Files in the contextual menu of an open tab to close all the open tabs except the selected one.
Click Close All in the contextual menu of an open tab to close all open tabs.
